name: Economic Analysis Tool
description: Economic Analysis Tool is a web application developed as part of a capstone project at CODELCO. It automates the technical-economic analysis process by reducing evaluation times from 6 weeks to 2, with data processing in under one minute. The project also features a supplier evaluation system that utilizes Python and advanced multicriteria decision-making methods (TOPSIS, Fuzzy AHP) to enhance efficiency.

name: OpenMobile
description: OpenMobile is a mobile application developed in React Native, featuring a Jira-inspired task management system. It is built on a robust microservices architecture that ensures scalability, real-time updates, and efficient communication. This project demonstrates modern mobile development practices by integrating enterprise-level functionalities for managing mobile workflows.
